neighbors.name: Garet Meyer
neighbors.claims: Garet Meyer (also spelled Garrett Meyer) is identified as a resident of Spotsylvania County in public records ([National Public Data](https://nationalpublicdata.com/people/m/beverly-meyer/)). No public records were found indicating Meyer has taken a position on local development or energy projects in Spotsylvania County.
neighbors.influence_justification: No public roles or civic leadership positions found.

approach_recommendations.engage: Conduct personal outreach to establish contact, as Meyer has no documented public stance. Verify preferred name spelling (Garet vs. Garrett) during initial interaction.

citations.claim: Identified as a resident of Spotsylvania County
citations.title: Beverly Meyer - National Public Data

neighbors.verification_notes: Public records list a 'Garrett Meyer' in Spotsylvania County; 'Garet' may be a spelling variation. No evidence of involvement in the 'Concerned Citizens of Spotsylvania County' or other opposition groups was found.

neighbors.name: Phillip Jerome & Shelby Noel Scarbro
neighbors.claims: Phillip and Shelby Scarbro are residents of Spotsylvania County, associated with the property at 8873 Pamunkey Rd, which corresponds to tax parcel 44-4-C ([Homes.com](https://www.homes.com/property/8873-pamunkey-rd-spotsylvania-va/hvv0hbldlpmr6/)). Phillip Scarbro has a documented address history at this location ([National Public Data](https://nationalpublicdata.com/people/s/phillip-scarbro/)). Family obituaries confirm the relationship between Phillip Jerome Scarbro and Shelby Noel Scarbro ([Covenant Funeral Service](https://www.covenantfuneralservice.com/obituaries/Stuart-Edward-Payne-Jr?obId=32468394)). Neither has been identified in local government minutes or media as voicing opinions on development or clean energy projects.
neighbors.influence_justification: Private residents with no identified public offices.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the Scarbro household through direct, friendly outreach. They have deep family ties in the region but no known history of opposing development.

neighbors.name: Jerry Joan Hughes & Julian Gonzalez
neighbors.claims: Jerry Hughes and Julian Gonzalez are identified as associated with Spotsylvania County. A Julian Gonzalez is listed as the President of Career Central in Spotsylvania, VA ([SlideShare](https://www.slideshare.net/slideshow/enet-recruiter-whos-who-in-high-tech-recruiting-guidebook-spring-2014/31685301)). Jerry Hughes is a registered real estate agent operating in Spotsylvania ([Realtor.com](https://www.realtor.com/realestateagents/5673970bbb954c010067c2d2)). They have not made any known public comments on development issues, and their names do not appear in coverage of community debates on recent projects.
neighbors.influence_justification: Local business owner and real estate professional.

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach with professional courtesy given their likely familiarity with local real estate and business sectors. Focus on property value protection and community benefits.

No joint opposition activity found.
